Our 2017 Show

LVLS

Marching Show

The 2017 Seguin Matador Marching Band and Color Guard present their 2017 show LVLS (pronunced levels). The ensemble works together to explore different levels of volume, space and emotion. A dynamic and modern show, LVLS is sure to fill audiences with excitement, pull at their hearstrings and dazzle spectators with amazement.
